Text.Page:
Comply with the officer's request and eliminate the monsters.
(Recommended for parties with 3 or more players.)

Is there anyone you can rely on?
If you cannot help us, we may have to surrender this place.

I can't offer you much in the way of thanks, but please help us anyway."Not a problem."

I knew I could count on you!

Thank you!
We're getting stronger too, but the soldiers here lack practice.

I will continue to reply on you in the future as well."I'll support you."
